00020 class Parallelepiped : public Volume

00022 public:
00036         Parallelepiped(double absorp, double reflect, double refract, double index,
00037                 Texture* tex, Point3D corner, Vector3D x, Vector3D y, Vector3D z) :
00038                         Volume(absorp, reflect, refract, index, tex), _corner(corner), _x(x), _y(y), _z(z)
00039     {
00040         if ( std::abs(_x.dot(_y)) == 1 || std::abs(_y.dot(_z)) == 1 || std::abs(_x.dot(_z)) == 1 ) {
00041             std::cout << "CRITICAL FAILURE : One parallelepiped isn't really a parallelepiped (angle 0 or 180)" << std::endl;
00042             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00043         }
00044         if (_x.norm() == 0 || _y.norm() == 0 || _z.norm() == 0) {
00045             std::cout << "CRITICAL FAILURE : One parallelepiped isn't really a parallelepiped (one null vector)" << std::endl;
00046             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00047         }
00048     }
